verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> in many <S%G4183>things<s%> we <S%G4417>offend<s%> <S%G537>all<s%>. If any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G4417>offend<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%>, the <S%G3778>same<s%> is a <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G435>man<s%>, and <S%G1415>able<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G5468>bridle<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%>.

<S%G2400>Behold<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G4143>ships<s%>, which though they <S%G5607>be<s%> so <S%G5082>great<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G1643>driven<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G4642>fierce<s%> <S%G417>winds<s%>, yet are they turned <S%G3329>about<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> a very <S%G1646>small<s%> <S%G4079>helm<s%>, <S%G3699%G302>whithersoever<s%> the <S%G2116>governor<s%> <S%G3730%G1014>listeth<s%>.

<S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> the <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G3196>member<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> boasteth great <S%G3166>things<s%>. <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, how <S%G2245>great<s%> a <S%G5208>matter<s%> a <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G381>kindleth<s%>!

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1100>tongue<s%> is a <S%G4442>fire<s%>, a <S%G2889>world<s%> of <S%G93>iniquity<s%>: <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2525>is<s%> the <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%>, that it <S%G4695>defileth<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> setteth on <S%G5394>fire<s%> the <S%G5164>course<s%> of <S%G1078>nature<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it is set on <S%G5394>fire<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G1067>hell<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5449>kind<s%> of <S%G2342>beasts<s%>, <S%G5037%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4071>birds<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> of <S%G2062>serpents<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of things in the <S%G1724>sea<s%>, is <S%G1150>tamed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> hath been <S%G1150>tamed<s%> of <S%G5449%G442>mankind<s%>:

<S%G1722%G846>Therewith<s%> bless <S%G2127>we<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722%G846>therewith<s%> curse <S%G2672>we<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G3669>similitude<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G3361%G1410>Can<s%> the fig <S%G4808>tree<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G4160>bear<s%> olive <S%G1636>berries<s%>? <S%G2228>either<s%> a <S%G288>vine<s%>, <S%G4810>figs<s%>? <S%G3779>so<s%> can <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G4077>fountain<s%> both <S%G4160>yield<s%> <S%G252>salt<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1099>fresh<s%>.

<S%G5101>Who<s%> is a wise <S%G4680>man<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> endued with <S%G1990>knowledge<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>? let him <S%G1166>shew<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4240>meekness<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> that is from <S%G509>above<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G3303%G53>pure<s%>, <S%G1899>then<s%> <S%G1516>peaceable<s%>, <S%G1933>gentle<s%>, and easy to be <S%G2138>intreated<s%>, <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruits<s%>, without <S%G87>partiality<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> without <S%G505>hypocrisy<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> is <S%G4687>sown<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> of them that <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>.
